No problem. Phone not served. Simply a change of mind.

Thank you for your help,

Once the package is received, the seller has 3 working days (5 if it's a laptop or an electrical appliance) to replace or repair your product. Or, within 2 working days to process its refund (if you're eligible).

A return is considered complete when the customer meets all the following conditions:

✔ Confirms that the product has not been repaired by a third party, and has not suffered any damage due to a fall or exposure to water.
✔ Confirms that personal data deletion has been performed.
✔ Has confirmed having the return label.
✔ Understands that it must include accessories as well as proof of purchase in its package.
✔ Understands that it has 14 days to use the return label.

Reminder: Once received, the seller has 3 working days (5 if it's a laptop or an electrical appliance) to replace or repair your product. Or, within 2 working days to process its refund (if you're eligible).

Hello ecomobile,

I hope you are well. 

I'm contacting you because the customer wants a refund.

The tracking link shows that you have received the parcel since 10/06/2024.

We look forward to hearing from you. Have a great day!

Desiree, BackMarket Customer Service

Dear Backcare,

We have received the device. We will proceed with the necessary actions soon. In the meantime, please do not refund the customer.

Regards,
JY

Dear Backcare,
